tips.1: When a wolf dies, his identity is revealed to the other players
tips.2: The gunner, the witch, the jailer are the only way for the village to kill the fool
tips.3: If the icon of a role has a brown background, the player's role is publicly known
tips.4: The serial killer can kill wolves and villagers alike, making them a dangerous neutral role
tips.5: Wolves can communicate with each other during the night phase to strategize their attacks
tips.6: The game usually resolves in 6 nights for a 16 players game

game.title: Werewolves game
game.emptyGeneralChat: Here's the discussion of the village
game.emptyWolvesChat: Here's the discussion of the wolves
game.emptyJailChat: Here's the discussion of the jail
game.emptyMediumChat: Here's the discussion with the dead
game.goBackToSleep: It's night, go back to sleep...
game.getReadyDesc: The game is about to start. Review the roles and click ready when you're prepared.
game.reviewRoles: Review the roles before the game starts

tooltip.voteAgainst: Villagers needs to choose : Vote against a player
tooltip.wolfVoteAgainst: Wolves need to choose who to eat

aftermath.nightSubtitle: Here's what happened during the night
aftermath.peacefulNight: A peaceful night... no one died
aftermath.noConsensus: No consensus was reached... no one was eliminated

dead.title: You are dead
dead.desc: Watch the game unfold from beyond the grave.
dead.tip1: Your role has been revealed to all players
dead.tip2: You can no longer vote or use abilities
dead.tipMedium: As Medium, you can still communicate with the living

jail.title: You are in jail
jail.desc: The Jailer has arrested you for the night.
jail.tip1: You cannot use your abilities tonight
jail.tip2: Convince the Jailer of your innocence
jail.tip3: If they doubt you, they may execute you

idle.nightResults: The night's events will soon be revealed.
idle.verdictSoon: The village's verdict will be announced.

villager.nightDesc: Stay safe through the night. You have no special abilities.
villager.dayDesc: Share your suspicions and listen to others.
villager.tip1: Pay attention to who dies tonight
villager.tip2: Think about who might be lying
villager.dayTip2: Share information but be careful with accusations

seer.nightDesc: Choose a player to reveal their true identity.
seer.dayDesc: Use the information you've gathered wisely.
seer.tip1: Reveal suspicious players to find wolves
seer.tip2: Be careful not to reveal yourself too early
seer.dayTip2: Wolves will target you if discovered

doctor.nightDesc: Select a player to heal from wolf attacks tonight.
doctor.dayDesc: Stay hidden - you're vital for the village's survival.
doctor.tip1: Try to predict who wolves will target
doctor.dayTip1: Don't reveal yourself to the village
doctor.dayTip2: Watch for patterns in wolf attacks

gunner.dayDesc: You can shoot a player during the day if you're certain.
gunner.nightDesc: Your gun only works during daylight.
gunner.tip1: Only shoot when you're sure of a wolf
gunner.tip2: Missing reveals your role to everyone
gunner.nightTip1: Think about who to target tomorrow

jailer.nightDescWithPrisoner: Talk to your prisoner and decide their fate.
jailer.dayDesc: Arrest a suspicious player to interrogate them tonight.
jailer.tip2: You can execute them if you believe they're evil
jailer.tip3: Executing an innocent loses your execution power
jailer.dayTip1: Arrested players can't use abilities at night
jailer.dayTip2: Use this to protect potential targets

witch.nightDesc: Use your protection or poison potion wisely.
witch.dayDesc: Your potions are powerful but limited.
witch.tip1: Protection potion: Save a player from death
witch.dayTip1: Don't reveal which potions you have left

medium.nightDesc: Communicate with dead players and gather information.
medium.dayDesc: Use the secrets the dead have shared with you.
medium.tip1: Dead players know their killer's identity
medium.tip2: You can revive one dead player
medium.dayTip1: Be careful sharing information from the dead

cupid.nightDesc: Choose two players to become lovers. If one dies, the other dies too.
cupid.dayDesc: Keep your lovers alive - their fate is linked.
cupid.tip2: If a wolf and villager are linked, they become a third faction

graveRobber.nightDesc: Loot a grave to steal the dead player's role.
graveRobber.dayDesc: Keep your grave robbing activities secret.
graveRobber.tip1: You become whatever role you steal
graveRobber.tip2: Choose valuable roles like Seer or Doctor
graveRobber.dayTip1: Don't reveal your new identity too soon

captain.dayDescAsserted: Your vote counts triple. Lead wisely.
captain.dayDesc: Reveal yourself to gain triple vote power.
captain.nightDesc: Your leadership is needed during the day.
captain.tip1: Assert duty to make your vote count 3x

cursed.title: Living under a curse
cursed.desc: You appear as a villager, but if wolves attack you, you become one of them.
cursed.tip1: Seers will see you as a villager
cursed.tip2: Survive wolf attacks to join their pack

wolf.nightDesc: Vote with your pack to choose tonight's victim.
wolf.dayDesc: Act innocent and cast suspicion on others.
wolf.dayTip2: Don't defend other wolves too obviously

wolfSeer.nightDesc: Vote to kill AND reveal a player's role to wolves.
wolfSeer.dayDesc: Share role information with your pack.
wolfSeer.tip1: Reveal dangerous roles like Seer or Gunner
wolfSeer.tip2: Help your pack target the right players
wolfSeer.dayTip1: Use your knowledge to frame villagers

alpha.nightDesc: Your vote counts double when choosing victims.
alpha.tip1: Your vote weighs more in the pack

nightmare.nightDesc: Your attacks leave survivors with nightmares.
nightmare.tip1: Survivors of your attacks are disabled

babyWolf.nightDesc: Choose your revenge target in case you're killed.
babyWolf.dayDesc: If killed, you take someone with you.
babyWolf.tip1: Choose who dies if you're killed

fool.title: Play the long con
fool.desc: You win by getting the village to vote you out.
fool.tip1: Act suspicious enough to be lynched
fool.tip2: But not so obvious they suspect you're the Fool
fool.tip3: You can only win by village vote, not wolf kills

sk.nightDesc: Kill one player each night until only you remain.

arsonist.nightDesc: Pour gasoline on players, then ignite when ready.
arsonist.dayDesc: Bide your time until the fire spreads.
arsonist.dayTip1: No one knows who you've marked

ghost.nightDesc: Visit a player each night to stay alive.
ghost.dayDesc: You must visit someone each night to survive.
ghost.tip1: Visit someone to stay safe tonight
ghost.tip2: You must visit a player each night to survive

game.confirmLeave: Are you sure you want to leave the game?
game.confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to logout?

intro.title: Welcome to the game of
intro.additionalInfo: The game is played in real time with a chat room, specific roles, and a voting system. The game can be played by multiple users or computers in real time thanks to server-side WebSockets.
